page.title: 05ORDINARY ADLINGTON PEOPLE
page.content:
The original Domesday Book recorded how the ordinary people in each village made their food from the land. Someone in 1,000 years from now might be interested in the diet of a typical class of primary schoolchildren.
Breakfast: cereal, toast, fruit-juice or tea Lunch: school meal; packed lunch Evening meal: beefburgers the most popular; favourite vegetable chipped poatoes Supper: sandwiches were favourite, followed by cereals, then biscuits, all washed down by milk or fruit juices.
Incidentally, the favourite pets of our class were 1:cat 2:dog 3:fish.
How typical are we for 1985?
